fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player, if their role number is below 921, they are deemed a classic role and your attack will be Unstoppable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are visited by a classic role, you will attack them in addition to your target.
- Classic roles that visit you will have their last will covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare classic roles instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure all classic roles are dead at the end of the game.
